instruction: I need to throw a surprise birthday party for my friend next week. Give me some ideas for decorations.
output: You can decorate the place with colorful balloons, streamers, and buntings. You can also hang up banners and birthday party signs, or you could put up a photo collage of your friend's happy memories. You can also hang a giant card on the wall that people can sign and present to the birthday person. You can even get some backdrops or props that your guests can use to take fun photos of themselves.
